item.title: Memory Addressing
item.description: I’ve had a lot of time to dive into certain pecularities of how programs are outlined both in RAM and on disk when working as a malware analyst.

item.title: Plan
item.description: Intro Physical drives: HDDs Flash memory RAM - Udemy SDF course Memory Layout (for an application) How it works File Systems FAT Apple NTFS HFS+ Data recovery Cases Research itself: personal insights, techniques and strategies
